text: The Hiding of Black Bill was a 1918 American silent short film directed by David Smith, distributed by General Film Company. It is based on a story by O. Henry. ==Cast== *Walter Rogers as W.L. Rogers - a hobo *Chet Ryan - Henry Ogden == References == ==External links== * Category:American black-and-white films Category:American silent feature films Category:American films Category:1918 films Category:Lost American films
title: The Hiding of Black Bill
